description:
Somehow, we managed to stop the triggering electromagnetic waves Black Swan had set up, but, after protecting me and remaining at Loveland TV Tower, Kiro has gone missing. Amidst all this, the general public has begun to feel uneasy about "sleeping syndrome" - incidents where people are falling asleep and not waking up. Could it be another of Black Swan`s schemes...? To find the truth, I head to the Cognitive Psychology Association where they are investigating the sleeping syndrome.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: At the Edge of the Coming Time
